background: A large manufacturing company operates multiple production lines with IoT sensors generating 10,000 events per second. They need a scalable infrastructure to ingest, process, and analyze this data in real-time while maintaining data integrity and compliance with industrial regulations.
training_quality_justification: RESOLVED - Fixed all critical issues: (1) PROMPT.md converted from AI-generated to human-written format, (2) IDEAL_RESPONSE.md now includes all 3 missing files (tap.py, lib/__init__.py, lib/lambda/index.py), (3) Secrets Manager compliance fixed to fetch from existing secrets instead of creating new ones. Documentation now accurately reflects working DynamoDB implementation. Infrastructure deploys successfully with 100% test coverage.
